author: inktrap

comments.content:
It looks like **Tiresias Screenfont** one of Tiresias fonts family:

> "The design was carried out, with specific reference to persons with visual impairments, on the philosophy that good design for visually impaired persons is good design for everybody."

[http://www.tiresias.org/fonts/screenfont/about\_screen.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317162739/http:/www.tiresias.org/fonts/screenfont/about_screen.htm "http://www.tiresias.org/fonts/screenfont/about\_screen.htm")
